nodes.text: A B23-1-14 permit was required to be submitted when collecting a bounty. Submission of a valid permit enabled a bounty hunter to collect all local, system, sector, and regional bounties as reward for a successful hunt.
Sammie Staable once attempted to collect the bounty for capturing Ten-Suckers Madoom without a valid permit, and only received the local bounty amount of 245 credits.
